attributes.additional_details: We call on the UK Government to publicly condemn these actions by the Chenyan government and to add international pressure on Chechnya to end this absurd abuse of human rights.
attributes.background:
Chechnya have created concentration camps where more than 100 men have been sent for simply being gay.

Gay men are being rounded up in numbers, tortured and sent to concentration camps where they are stripped of their human rights.
